2 Year CPS Extended Protection Plan Whether it’s part of your home entertainment system, or simply for watching movies and shows, people enjoy watching TV. However, sometimes accidents can occur that can break, or drastically impact the performance of the TV. This includes dropping the TV while moving or mounting, and kids hitting or knocking the TV over. It even protects you from burn-in, something not typically covered by the OEM. Plus, if something happens to your remote control, you can ask for a hot swap replacement without question. 2 Year Extended Protection Features Accidental Damage coverageImpact DamageDropping while moving or mounting the TVFrom kids playing ball in the houseBurn in covered - usually not covered by the OEMRemote Control replacement - hot swap, no question askedTech Support Included - initial product setup and/or configurationAuthorized service dispatched by Consumer Priority Service

OVERVIEW: Artwork, shows, movies and memories—display what you love on the picture frame-like TV. On The Frame, see everything on the QLED 4K TV at 100% Color Volume with Quantum Dot that saturates your screen with a billion colors. Switch on Art Mode and transform your TV into your own personal art exhibit. With Anti-Reflection and the Matte Display, it’s easy on the eyes. Customize The Frame with a stylish bezel to fit your décor and hang it flush against the wall to look just like the real thing. Anti-Reflection with Matte Display Your artwork or your favorite show will look as good in the morning as it does at night with the lights on. Anti-Reflection technology and the Matte Display Film premium matte finish limit light distraction on your screen by reducing the effects of glare. QLED 4K TV with 100% Color Volume Bask in a billion shades of brilliant color at 100% Color Volume. Quantum Dot technology brings you a gorgeous picture by transforming light into vivid color that stays true for bold detail, even as the scene brightens. Art Mode Enjoy your personal art exhibit when you’re not watching TV. Just switch on Art Mode. When the TV’s off, The Frame becomes a display of your art collection, thanks to the built-in motion sensor. Curate your own photos and art or choose from Art Store, with more than 1,400 new and classic works of art from world-class museums and galleries. Plus, complement your images with matting options to take your art experience to the next level. Slim-Fit Wall Mount Included Hang The Frame flush against the wall to look like an actual picture frame. Made to appear like the real thing, the TV has a Slim Fit WallMount; included will all The Frame purchases keeps it as close to the surface as possible. For the ultimate in decor, limit the cable clutter to just the One Invisible Connection cable that goes to the Slim One Connect box to keep all eyes on what’s on actual display. Customizable Frame Complement your style with the Customizable Bezel for The Frame. Pick the bezel type and color to fit you home décor, and simply snap it on. Choose from Modern or Beveled designs in several different colors.Since it’s magnetic, it’s easy to change when the mood or inspiration strikes. Quantum HDR Go beyond HDTV with Quantum HDR that delivers an expanded range of color and contrast. Step up to the brilliant possibilities of what your picture can bring you. Art Store With a subscription to Samsung’s Art Store, you have unlimited access to a library of over 1,400 new and classic pieces of art from established and emerging artists. Samsung Collection It’s easy to upload your own photography, family portraits and other memories to The Frame from your phone or a USB flash drive. And with 6GB of storage in My Collection, you’ve got lots of room to share masterpieces of your own making. Motion Sensor Intelligent motion sensors help you maximize energy efficiency. Set up your art to display when you’re in the room, and turn off when you’re not. *Motion Sensor operates only in Art Mode. Performance may vary depending on the lighting condition. Smart TV Powered by Tizen Do all you enjoy with Smart TV Powered by Tizen. Discover your must-have apps and streaming services all just a few clicks away.

Powered by Tizen Do all you enjoy with Smart TV Powered by Tizen. Discover your must-have apps and streaming services all just a few clicks away. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Art mode is awesome
reviews.reviewText: Finally got this installed. The picture quality is really very good, but the art mode is fantastic. I haven’t figured it all out yet but so much better than a black screen when there the TV is off. At night you can actually turn it off or program it to a set time off. The remote is solar or can be chanrged which is better than going through batteries.The first tv was damaged in shipping but the seller reordered and delivered with a white glove service and it arrived in very good condition. The only downfall is the wire that goes from the tv to a connection box. I hope Samsung solves this in the future. Our TV was installed over a fireplace which was flat to the wall, so would have required a lengthly install to go through the studs and then down to a cabinet. with the connecting wire. Our solution was our FP mantel had a post on each side that was hollow, and the installer drilled down through it and out at the floor. The wire only needed to be hidden on the mantel itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Warranty is horrible
reviews.reviewText: Product worked fine until we plugged in a Google Chrome device and it went dead. Tech service took four hours texting to determine it was dead. Samsug service issued a repair order and then canceled the repair order two weeks later without notifying me. When we called they ordered a replacement unit but then four days later they called to say they could not send a replacement unit since they have no warranty stock. Now they want to take the TV away and issue a credit two days after they pick up the TV! Spent a bunch, have a dead TV and now waiting on a trucker to pick up the dead TV and hopefully get a replacement. Sucks big time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars anti glare really works
reviews.reviewText: I don't think the picture is as sharp as on my 5-year-old Samsung it is replacing but it's not bad and the antiglare is a big help. I think possibly this is because of the matte finish on screen making it seem less sharp. However, I have a large western window that my TV faces and it was nearly impossible to watch TV in the afternoon and early evening. The anti-glare screen completely eliminated the problem. The biggest con is the fancy new remote control. It takes multiple steps to get to what you want and just doesn't do some things at all. I will see if my old universal remote can be made to work on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: We love this! It definitely met expectations. All the features and specifications are on point. Definitely happy with this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Screen peeled off.
reviews.reviewText: The entire screen peeled off and exposed all the leds. Sent back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good looking smart TV

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: WARNING: I love the promise of this TV, and as a piece of art on the wall it's great (as long as the artwork is not solid color), but the BACKLIGHT IS VERY UN-EVEN, resulting in many 'cloudy' patches (that show up most when watching a dark movie in the evening). I tried to get this fixed with Samsung but after weeks of tech support nightmare they basically just told me to go away (awful customer support process). I've researched this online and it seems many people have experienced similar problems. Please spare yourself this misery - do not buy this product.
